requirements.summary: Update the single source of truth live version constants so the UI reflects Draft 34 as the currently published draft and shows the correct publish date.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/release/liveVersion.ts exports LIVE_VERSION with the exact string value 'Draft 34'.
frontend/src/release/liveVersion.ts exports LIVE_VERSION_DATE as a YYYY-MM-DD string matching the Draft 34 publish date.
After building the frontend, any UI location that displays the live/draft version shows Draft 34 (no remaining Draft 32 references used for live version display).

file_operations.description: Update LIVE_VERSION to 'Draft 34' and set LIVE_VERSION_DATE to the Draft 34 publish date in YYYY-MM-DD format, keeping this file as the single source of truth for version display across the UI.
